eggWeakness.title: Vitality
eggWeakness.description: Empty Attack roll again adult Nemesis' is treated as 1 damage

nemesisBodyWeakness.title: Fire sensitivity
nemesisBodyWeakness.description: When Nemesis suffers from fire, Molotov cocktail or Flamethrower, it takes 1 additional damage

crewMemberBodyWeakness.title: Energy sensitivity
crewMemberBodyWeakness.description: Each energy weapon attack that deals 1 damage, deals 1 additional damage
